job_tasks.phrase: Develop, test, and maintain Large Language Models for various applications.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the creation, testing, and upkeep of LLMs, which is a core component of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and integrate open-source AI/ML models into our product suite
job_tasks.justification: The evaluation and integration of pre-existing models into a product suite falls under the modeling task category, as it involves working with and adapting models.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with the product development team to implement AI features in our contract drafting tool, chatbot, and other products.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the integration of AI features into existing products, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay abreast of the latest developments in AI/ML technologies, particularly in the realm of LLMs
job_tasks.justification: While focused on learning, this directly relates to understanding and potentially applying new modeling techniques, especially for LLMs.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with the data science team to improve model performance and accuracy
job_tasks.justification: Improving model performance and accuracy is a fundamental aspect of model development and refinement.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior team members (interns)
job_tasks.justification: While mentorship is a soft skill, the technical leadership aspect implies guiding development and implementation, aligning with software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Document and present research findings and development processes
job_tasks.justification: Documenting and presenting development processes is part of the software development lifecycle and knowledge sharing.

job_tasks.phrase: continuously integrating AI/ML tooling in the products we develop.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly states the integration of AI/ML tools into products, which is a software development activity.

soft_skills.phrase: Strong communication and teamwork are essential.
work closely with the product development team
Collaborate with the data science team
Stay abreast of the latest developments in AI/ML technologies
team and communication is our top priority
You'll be pushed by your colleagues to develop yourself and the team

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Large Language Models (LLMs) and integrating them into products, which aligns directly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer. Key responsibilities include developing and maintaining LLMs, evaluating and integrating AI/ML models, and implementing AI features in applications like chatbots, all core activities for this profile.
